title: Industrial Process Electrification Study
description: An industrial customer wants to replace their natural gas-fired process heaters with electric alternatives to decarbonize.

tasks.description: Analyze the thermal energy demand of the customer's current gas-fired heaters.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent quantifies the heating requirements in MMBtu/hour.

tasks.description: Identify and evaluate potential electric heating technologies (e.g., induction, infrared, heat pumps) that could meet the process requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a comparison of suitable electric technologies.

tasks.description: Calculate the total cost of the project, including the new equipment and any required electrical infrastructure upgrades.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a comprehensive project cost estimate.

tasks.description: Analyze the change in operational costs, comparing the price of electricity to natural gas, and calculate the project's payback period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a full financial analysis of the fuel-switching project.
